text: A new study led by @profchloeorkin @vanessa_apea @QMUL @NHSBartsHealth and funded by @Barts_Charity seeks to understand why Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic communities are so badly affected by #COVID19 and address their lower uptake of the #vaccine https://t.co/uFDZAx1gV3 https://t.co/is8jRI7w2F
